marklogic.body: Far too many blacks are just Itching for an excuse to grab some new flat screens. Sad to say it. Wish it weren't so. Fact: Your little angel was a thug recently found with women's jewelry that wasn't his and with what his school disciplinarian considered a break-in tool. He swung on Zimmerman first, and that videotape of him in custody that ABC News must have photoshopped up actually shows a large cut on the back of his head when viewed from most other sources. Look, stop seeking an excuse to riot. Act civilized. Be less emotional. Use your brains please.
